snippet: BNP Paribas has hired a former top official at the U.S. Treasury Department's sanctions office, people familiar with the matter said, part of the French bank's effort to build up its compliance department after its record settlement over sanctions...

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: BNP Paribas Hires Ex-U.S.Treasury Official for Compliance Job
headline.main: Exclusive: BNP Paribas Hires Ex-U.S.Treasury Official for Compliance Job

lead_paragraph: BNP Paribas has hired a former top official at the U.S. Treasury Department's sanctions office, people familiar with the matter said, part of the French bank's effort to build up its compliance department after its record settlement over sanctions violations.
